jump_explanation: ^You can jump over this pit by pressing SPACE!
jumpGamepad: ^You can jump over this pit by pressing the south button!
crouching: ^But don't worry, I am sure you can fit through there with your new Form when pressing C!
crouchingGamepad: ^But don't worry, I am sure you can fit through there with your new Form when pressing the left shoulder!
firstBloom: ^I'm starting to feel a bit hungry, what about you?
explosion: ^It sounded like it came from the direction your spaceship is lying.
sprinting: ^You can also hold SHIFT to sprint!
sprintingGamepad: ^You can also hold the west button to sprint!
stateChange: ^Oh I didn't expect that. What happened to you?
^You look pretty sticky. Maybe you can take advantage from this to stick to a certain kind of surface.
^Hopefully you can change back. Let's find out, press F!
stateChangeGamepad: ^Oh I didn't expect that. What happened to you?
^You look pretty sticky. Maybe you can take advantage from this to stick to a certain kind of surface.
^Hopefully you can change back. Let's find out, press the nord button!
theFlower: ^That's the kind of flowers that help us to grow up.
^Maybe it will help you too, try taking the plant with E!
tipForFlower: ^I'm still hungry! Did you see the flower on the big branch?
^It looked delicious, let's go and get it.
